## PROBLEMA 2

```{fecha}
moda <- function(v) {
  uniqv <- unique(v)
  uniqv[which.max(tabulate(match(v, uniqv)))]
}

vector_1 <- c(4,1,3,9,7)
vector_2<- c(1,9,4,2,2)
vector_3 <- c(9,1,4,5,1)

lista <- list(vector_1,vector_2,vector_3)

lapply(lista, moda)
```
